room_title: Escape room "Panic in the Bunker" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: My family and friends had a great time tonight! You guys are so accommodatingâ€”-and FUN! It was difficult at times but thankfully we had 4 clues. We made it out of the Nuclear Room with 4 minutes to spare. So glad we were able to stop the warhead from going off.We will return!

room_title: Escape room "Panic in the Bunker" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: We just did the Nuclear room and had an amazing time! Complex room with thought provoking puzzles. Lots of unique approaches to different and varying puzzles. Can't wait to try the pirate room!

room_title: Escape room "Panic in the Bunker" by Port City Escape in Wilmington
review: This was my 2nd escape room. We did the nuclear countdown. Very helpful staff and definitely a challenge! I would definitely come back again. Not sure if this room is for beginners though unless you have 3 or more people.
